name: BILLINGS FLYING SERVICE
description: Vendor and operator of rotary wing aerial fire-fighting machines.
sampleDescriptions: Establish relations for client with administrative agencies as well as both chambers of congress as a critical vendor for aerial firefighting services, including contracting.
